description: Role of Osx and certain miRNAs in tooth development.   A – The role of Osx in dentinogenesis is shown by its regulation on Dspp.   B – Osx regulates the differentiation of cementoblasts through Wnt-Î²-catenin pathway.   C – Fine-tuning role of miRNA in tooth development.
title: OSX and miRNAs in tooth development
